S

saveGame() - Method in class game.Game
This method saves progress to saveFile.txt that is located in program's folder
selected - Variable in class menus.Button
Each button has a boolean "selected" if it's True then The program would compile the button in a different way (for example bigger font or some extra graphics)
selected - Variable in class menus.LevelButton
Each button has a boolean "selected" if it's True then The program would compile the button in a different way (for example bigger font or some extra graphics)
selected - Variable in class menus.ShopButton
 
selectedColor - Variable in class menus.Button
would be used if we want to use a different color for our selected button.
selectedColor - Variable in class menus.LevelButton
would be used if we want to use a different color for our selected button.
selectedFont - Variable in class menus.Button
Second font, which would be used if we want to use a different font for our selected button.
selectedFont - Variable in class menus.LevelButton
Second font, which would be used if we want to use a different font for our selected button.
selectemItem - Variable in class menus.ShopButton
Second Item , it is only a bigger version of item image and should be drawn when the button is selected.
setImage() - Method in class assets.Player
Sets image from Array list for each frame based on Player.standingOrDucking and Player.animationFrame.
setImage() - Method in class assets.Shooter
Sets image from Array list for each frame based on Shooter.animationFrame.
setPlayerSound() - Method in class assets.Player
Sets sound of jumping based on game options Game.getSoundOption().
setSelected(boolean) - Method in class menus.Button
The method that would change the "selected" variable to the given input.
setSelected(boolean) - Method in class menus.LevelButton
The method that would change the "selected" variable to the given input.
setSelected(boolean) - Method in class menus.ShopButton
The method that would change the "selected" variable to the given input.
setVisible(Boolean) - Method in class assets.Sprite
Changes value of visible boolean
shieldOn - Variable in class game.Game
Boolean used to determinate if the shield has been bought in shop.
Shooter - Class in assets
Class used to create shooter character.
Shooter(int, int) - Constructor for class assets.Shooter
Constructor of Shooter class.
shooter - Variable in class game.Game
An object created using Shooter class
shooterRandomTimer - Variable in class game.Game
Variable used to determine at random when new danger sign and bullet is created
shooterRun - Variable in class assets.Shooter
ArrayList containing all frames of animation for shooter sprites.
shooterTimer - Variable in class game.Game
Variable used to create new danger sign and bullet, based on mainTimer and shooterRandomTimer
shop - Variable in class game.Game
An object created using Shop class
Shop - Class in menus
 
Shop() - Constructor for class menus.Shop
In constructor the class makes options array (At this stage of Shop we only have one Item so the options array would only have 1 element.
ShopButton - Class in menus
This class is made to be used during the Shop processing.
ShopButton(Image, Image, int, int) - Constructor for class menus.ShopButton
It's a costructor and initialize every variable.
shopPic - Variable in class menus.Shop
The background Image of the menu
Sound - Class in assets
Class used to load and play sounds.
Sound() - Constructor for class assets.Sound
Constructor of Sound class.
sound - Variable in class menus.Options
The background image of the menu and icons for sound and music
soundOption - Static variable in class game.Game
Boolean used to check if sounds are turned on or off
sounds - Variable in class game.Game
An object created using Sound class
Sprite - Class in assets
Class used to create all the sprites in this program.
Sprite(int, int) - Constructor for class assets.Sprite
Default constructor of this class
SPRITE_SPEED - Variable in class assets.Coin
Speed at which coin moves per one timer tick
SPRITE_SPEED - Variable in class assets.Powerup
Speed at which powerup moves per one timer tick
sprites - Variable in class game.Game
ArrayList of all the sprites visible on the screen other then Shooter and Player
spritesRandomTimer - Variable in class game.Game
Variable used to determine at random when new Obstacle is created
standingHeight - Variable in class assets.Player
Height of player while standing.
standingOrDucking - Variable in class assets.Player
Variable for imageList to determine which sprite to use.
standingSprites - Variable in class assets.Player
ArrayList containing all frames of animation for standing player sprites.
standingUP - Variable in class assets.Player
Player is standing up from ducking.
Start - Class in game
Main class that starts the program and set few options for program's window
Start() - Constructor for class game.Start
Constructor of Start class.
stopHere - Variable in class menus.CongratsScreen
If it is true the class could not be updated
stopHere - Variable in class menus.GameOverScreen
If it is true the class could not be updated
stopHere - Variable in class menus.Levels
If it is true the class could not be updated
stopHere - Variable in class menus.Menu
If it's true, the menu could not be updated (Used for not changing the currentselected when user's finger is still on the keyboard.)
stopHere - Variable in class menus.Options
If it is true the class could not be updated
stopHere - Variable in class menus.Pause
If it is true the class could not be updated
stopHere - Variable in class menus.Shop
If it's true, the menu could not be updated (Used for not changing the currentselected when user's finger is still on the keyboard.)
stopHere - Variable in class menus.Tutorial
If it's true, the menu could not be updated (Used for not changing the currentselected when user's finger is still on the keyboard.)
stopTimers() - Method in class game.Game
This method stops all timers.
